Package com.group12.controller

Class RoomController

java.lang.Object
com.group12.controller.RoomController
@Component public class RoomController extends Object
The RoomController is responsible for managing the room or lobby interactions in a multiplayer game setting. This component handles functionalities like sending and receiving messages, managing the player list, handling game readiness and kick actions.

    • initData

      public void initData(GameData gameData, String gameId, Boolean isGameCreated) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      A controller method to initialize some data about the game at the very beginning.
      Parameters:
      gameData - - Game data that is fetched from the database.
      gameId - - Game id.
      isGameCreated - - Boolean variable to know if the game is created by the client user.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - - exception of json serialize/deserialize function.

      URISyntaxException - - Throws exception.

      public void sendAfterConnection()
      A method to send GAME_CREATED or USER_JOINED messages according to joining room.

      public void addPlayerToTheList(String username, String color, String[] readyList)

      username - - Username that will be added.
      color - - User color that will be added.
      readyList - - Users ready status as a list.

      public void setReadyColor(String username)

      Parameters:
      username - - Provided username with the read status is achieved with the last ws message.

    • toggleStartGameButton

      A method to toggle on/off the start game button.

    • leaveRoom

      public void leaveRoom() throws IOException
